1.title: Chapter 13

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

1.plot: Helen (Tanja Melendez Lynch), Greg (David Afflick), Shelby (Kathryn Shasha), and Colton (Jonathan Sartell) struggle to figure out what to do next when they find nothing in the attic. The final moments of Madison's (Alexa Hartman) and Mrs. Fitzgerald's (Marty Smith) lives are revealed.

2.title: Chapter 14

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

2.plot: Meredith (Karen Ann Martino) learns the truth about Madison (Alexa Hartman) and her connection to her mother, Ruth (Judith Maloney). Helen (Tanja Melendez Lynch), Greg (David Afflick), Shelby (Kathryn Shasha), and Colton (Jonathan Sartell) are put in danger.

3.title: Chapter 15

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

3.plot: Helen (Tanja Melendez Lynch), Greg (David Afflick), Shelby (Kathryn Shasha), and Colton (Jonathan Sartell) confront their own darkness and must make a difficult choice. Madison (Alexa Hartman) faces her fear.

4.title: Chapter 16

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

4.plot: Helen (Tanja Melendez Lynch), Greg (David Afflick), Shelby (Kathryn Shasha), and Colton (Jonathan Sartell) reunite two years later.

1.title: Chapter 1

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

1.plot: Helen (Tanja Melendez Lynch) seeks answers after she continues to have a nightmare about a young girl in an attic (Alexa Hartman).

2.title: Chapter 2

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

2.plot: Helen (Tanja Melendez Lynch) finds two additional people having similar nightmares about the girl in the attic. Meanwhile, Shelby (Kathryn Shasha) confides in her therapist (Pamela Jayne Morgan) about her nightmares. Colton (Jonathan Sartell) gets in trouble when his foster parents find his drugs.

3.title: Chapter 3

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

3.plot: Helen (Tanja Melendez Lynch) decides if she wants to work with Meredith (Karen Ann Martino) and Greg (David Afflick) on finding Madison (Alexa Hartman). Shelby (Kathryn Shasha) fights with her daughter (Avery Hatch). Dr. Carson (Pamela Jayne Morgan) makes a shocking discovery.

4.title: Chapter 4

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

4.plot: Dr. Carson (Pamela Jayne Morgan) tells Colton's foster parents (Paul Taft, Rosemary Pacheco) about her discovery. Meanwhile, Helen (Tanja Melendez Lynch) reveals her true colors to Greg (David Afflick).

1.title: Chapter 5

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

1.plot: Greg (David Afflick) tries to convince Helen (Tanja Melendez Lynch) to return to the group. Dr. Carson (Pamela Jayne Morgan) connects Shelby (Kathryn Shasha) with Colton (Jonathan Sartell) to make more sense of their strange dreams.

2.title: Chapter 6

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

2.plot: Meredith (Karen Ann Martino) attempts to change Helen's (Tanja Melendez Lynch) mind about working with the group. Meanwhile, Shelby (Kathryn Shasha) and Colton (Jonathan Sartell) arrive at Meredith's house seeking answers about their dreams.

3.title: Chapter 7

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

3.plot: As the group finally comes together, Helen (Tanja Melendez Lynch), Greg (David Afflick), Shelby (Kathryn Shasha), and Colton (Jonathan Sartell) experience new nightmares which make them question their involvement in trying to find Madison.

4.title: Chapter 8

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

4.plot: The group questions everything after a shocking turn of events. Greg (David Afflick) makes a discovery that may lead them closer to finding answers about Madison (Alexa Hartman).

1.title: Chapter 9

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

1.plot: Helen (Tanja Melendez Lynch) and Greg (David Afflick) work together to find out information about Ruth Martin (Judith Maloney). Colton (Jonathan Sartell) tries to convince his foster father, Michael (Paul Taft), for assistance.

2.title: Chapter 10

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

2.plot: Helen (Tanja Melendez Lynch), Greg (David Afflick), Shelby (Kathryn Shasha), and Colton (Jonathan Sartell) take a road trip to George's House. While stuck in traffic, the four discuss trying to cope with the many hurdles within their life.

3.title: Chapter 11

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

3.plot: George (Herbert Fuchs) reveals new information that leads everyone even closer to finding the attic.

4.title: Chapter 12

episode of.title: The Girl in the Attic (TV Series 2016–2018)

4.plot: Helen (Tanja Melendez Lynch), Greg (David Afflick), Shelby (Kathryn Shasha), and Colton (Jonathan Sartell) enter the Fitzgerald House and make their way to the attic. Meanwhile, Madison (Alexa Hartman) seeks help from a familiar face.

akas: The Girl in the Attic (United States)
plot: Five people have similar dreams about a girl trapped in an attic.::Angelwood Pictures
